AutoConfig.description: This action is used to perform automated configuration of the Account Service.
AutoConfig.longDescription: This action shall perform automated configuration of the Account Service as specified by the Contoso service manual.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
